statements: SELECT * FROM affiliates;
SELECT name, email FROM affiliates;
SELECT affiliate_id, name, email FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM affiliates WHERE name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT affiliate_id, name, phone_number FROM affiliates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM affiliates WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT affiliate_id, name, phone_number FROM affiliates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, website_url FROM affiliates WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT name, email FROM affiliates;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_accounts;
SELECT account_name, email FROM affiliate_accounts WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT referral_code, account_name FROM affiliate_accounts;
SELECT account_name, email, referral_code FROM affiliate_accounts WHERE affiliate_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE affiliate_id = 3;
SELECT account_name, email FROM affiliate_accounts WHERE referral_code LIKE 'AB%'
SELECT * FROM affiliate_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC

SELECT account_name, revenue FROM affiliate_accounts JOIN performance_metrics ON affiliate_accounts.affiliate_id = performance_metrics.affiliate_id WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions >= 10 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT affiliate_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue

SELECT account_name, email, clicks, signups, conversions, revenue FROM affiliate_accounts LEFT JOIN performance_metrics ON affiliate_accounts.affiliate_id = performance_metrics.affiliate_id WHERE signups > 5 ORDER BY signups DESC, revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM affiliate_accounts;
SELECT account_name, affiliate_code FROM affiliate_accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 500.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, payment_amount FROM affiliate_accounts INNER JOIN payment_history ON affiliate_accounts.account_id = payment_history.account_id;
SELECT account_name, affiliate_code FROM affiliate_accounts;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE clicks > 1000;
SELECT account_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount >= 500.00;
SELECT * FROM affiliate_accounts JOIN campaign_performance ON affiliate_accounts.account_id = campaign_performance.account_id;
SELECT account_name, payment_amount FROM affiliate_accounts JOIN payment_history ON affiliate_accounts.account_id = payment_history.account_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM affiliates;
SELECT affiliate_name, email FROM affiliates WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT affiliate_name, conversion_amount FROM affiliates INNER JOIN conversions ON affiliates.affiliate_id = conversions.click_id;

SELECT affiliate_name, campaign_name, click_timestamp FROM affiliates INNER JOIN clicks ON affiliates.affiliate_id = clicks.affiliate_id INNER JOIN campaigns ON clicks.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT affiliate_name, email, join_date FROM affiliates WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT affiliate_id, campaign_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks WHERE affiliate_id = 2 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT click_id, conversion_amount, conversion_date FROM conversions WHERE conversion_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM affiliates;
SELECT affiliate_id, username, email FROM affiliates;
SELECT campaign_id, affiliate_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT click_id, campaign_id, click_date, device_type FROM clicks WHERE device_type = 'desktop';
SELECT conversion_id, click_id, conversion_date, revenue FROM conversions WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT click_id, click_date, ip_address FROM clicks WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT affiliate_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS num_campaigns FROM campaigns GROUP BY affiliate_id HAVING num_campaigns > 2;
SELECT affiliate_id, campaign_name, revenue FROM campaigns c JOIN conversions co ON c.campaign_id = co.click_id WHERE revenue > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
